Class WorkoutFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.omrifit.sport.WorkoutFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, Recyclerview_Interface
public class WorkoutFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment implements Recyclerview_Interface
WorkoutFragment is responsible for displaying the workout plan of the day. It interacts with Firebase to fetch and display exercises.
